de.tif.jacob.scheduler
Class SchedulerTask

java.lang.Object
  de.tif.jacob.scheduler.SchedulerTask

public abstract class SchedulerTask
extends java.lang.Object

A task that can be scheduled for recurring execution by a Scheduler.

Method Detail

run

public abstract void run()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
The action to be performed by this scheduler task.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getKey

public java.lang.String getKey()
Returns the identifier for this task. You can use this identifier to cancel the task at the scheduler.

Returns:
the task key
See Also:
Scheduler.cancel(String)

hibernatedOnSchedule

public boolean hibernatedOnSchedule()
Returns whether this task should be hibernated by default, i.e. to start the task it has to be enabled manually by means of the jACOB admin application.

By default this method returns false.

Returns:
true if hibernated by default, otherwise false

iterator

public abstract ScheduleIterator iterator()

runPerInstance

public abstract boolean runPerInstance()
Returns whether this task should be executed on each jACOB runtime instance. This method is important, if a jACOB installation should be clustered (i.e. more than one jACOB runtime instance) for scalability or availability reasons. Task implementations should overwrite this method and return true, if a task should be executed on each jACOB instance.

Returns:
true, if this task should run per jACOB runtime instance, otherwise false

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of the task.
By default this is the (short) name of derived class.

Returns:
the task name

getScope

public SchedulerTask.Scope getScope()
Returns the scope of the task.

Returns:
the task scope

getApplicationName

public java.lang.String getApplicationName()
Returns the name of the application this task belongs to.

Returns:
the application name or null

getApplicationVersion

public Version getApplicationVersion()
Returns the version of the application this task belongs to.

Returns:
the application version or null

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Returns whether this task should be visible and maintainable within the admin application

Returns:
true if visible otherwise false

getTaskDetails

public java.lang.String getTaskDetails()
Returns additional task details which could be used for querying for tasks.

Returns:
additional task details or null

getTaskOwner

public java.lang.String getTaskOwner()
Returns task owner if existing.

Returns:
task owner or null

cancel

public final boolean cancel()
Cancels this scheduler task.

This method may be called repeatedly; the second and subsequent calls have no effect.

Returns:
true if this task was been canceled by this method call

getState

public final de.tif.jacob.scheduler.SchedulerTaskState getState()
Returns the current state of this task.

Returns:
the task state

hibernate

public final boolean hibernate()
Hibernates this scheduler task.

This method may be called repeatedly; the second and subsequent calls have no effect.

Returns:
true if this task was been hibernated by this method call

wakeup

public final boolean wakeup()
Wakes up this scheduler task from hibernate status.

This method may be called repeatedly; the second and subsequent calls have no effect.

Returns:
true if this task was been waked up by this method call
